Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights travelling tuscany 2 weeks hotel beautiful size compared weve stayed cities breakfast fresh fruit criticism pay extra juice water coffee beautiful restaurant couple minutes walk hotel recommended traveller try wonderful nice bars near dont travel rome centre dinner drinks note hotel top hill transport available walk hotel aware
